H3.text: what else did alexander graham bell invent other than the telephone. Graphaphone

A4.text: The Graphophone was co-invented by Alexander Graham Bell, Charles Sumner Tainter, and Chichester Bell in 1886.

A5.text: The Volta Graphophone Company was created on January 6, 1886, to control the patents and commercial development of sound recording inventions, one of which became the first Dictaphone.

A6.text: The Development of Sound Recording at the Volta Laboratory
